BR_text.BRsummary: [tune] PBT hyperparam_mutations does not allow for nested dicts any more
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
 
 Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS):
 Ray: 0.8.2
 Just recently a new check that hyperparam_mutations are either a list or a callable was introduced. (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/master/python/ray/tune/schedulers/pbt.py#L182>https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/master/python/ray/tune/schedulers/pbt.py#L182</denchmark-link>
 )
 Unfortunately the configs I use with my Experiments are nested dicts and I can now no longer use PBT to tune parameters in those nested dicts.
 Is there a reason that nested dicts are no longer allowed? :(

comments_0.comment_text: Ah, sorry that is a regression. Let me push a patch..

comments_1.comment_text: Awesome, thanks! Can you make a quick bug fix release for this or do we have to wait another month for the next normal release? :)

comments_2.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/timonbimon>@timonbimon</denchmark-link>
  you can use the nightly wheels <denchmark-link:https://ray.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html#latest-snapshots-nightlies>https://ray.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html#latest-snapshots-nightlies</denchmark-link>
